content: Also at the GSX show, Korean security leader Hanwha Techwin introduced multiple cameras based on Ambarellaâs CV2 AI vision SoCs, including new P series dome cameras with dual 6 megapixel imagers and AI features and new T series cameras including vandal proof and bispectrum AI thermal models. We expect non-GAAP OpEx in the fourth quarter to be in the range of $46 million to $49 million, with the increase compared to Q3, driven by the continued build out of new advanced CV3 SoCs and CES marketing activities. So first of all, I think our role in this relationship is we are a strategic tier 2 to Conti, and we are providing support to the -- one of the support we need to provide is porting their software onto our CV3, which we have been talking about this strategy for many years, and we believe we are the one that really focused on this business model versus our competitors.
